ygData.subject: RE: Athren's Equipment
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok a lower level example eager for suggestions.  I may not agree with them but I will consider them. Head:  	Blackened Iron Crown (Sigh) Face:	 	Lizardskin
ygData.messageBody:
Ok a lower level example eager for suggestions. I may not agree with them
but I will consider them.

Head: Blackened Iron Crown (Sigh)
Face: Lizardskin Tribal Mask (Desperately wants a Guise)
Neck: Golden Pearl Choker (the regular one, not Black Pearl AC:5,
+9 vs Poison)
Ears: One brass earring, one onyx earring
Shoulders: Bloodstained Mantle
Back: Splinted Bronze Cloak (Uuhh, heavy)
Arms: Barbed Arms (damn, still have these?)
Bracer: Bracer of Erollisi
Bracer: Silver Plated Bracer
Fingers: 2 Jagged Bands (AC:5, +3 Str)
Chest: Small Bronze Breastplate or Dwarven Ringmail Tunic, depends on zone
Legs: Shin Greaves
Feet: Small bronze boots (and gads are they ugly)
Hands: Shin Gauntlets
Waist: Small bronze girdle (was Purity Belt, but str finally high enuf to
dump)

Dragoon Dirk
Screaming Mace or Barbed Leather Whip (noisy) or Crookstinger vs. Casters

Wish List: Replace the helm, boots, cape, and arms with ???

Kitasi 21 and still going
